scripts.start: npx lerna run build:watch --scope=haengdong-design --parallel & npx lerna run dev --scope=haengdong-client --parallel
scripts.ci:versionup:patch: npx lerna version patch --no-push --no-git-tag-version --yes && npm run commit-version
scripts.ci:versionup:minor: npx lerna version minor --no-push --no-git-tag-version --yes && npm run commit-version
scripts.ci:versionup:major: npx lerna version major --no-push --no-git-tag-version --yes && npm run commit-version
